## CredentialStatusResolverRegistry.register() method

register is a method to add a credential status resolver for specific credential status type

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(type: CredentialStatusType, resolver: CredentialStatusResolver): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [CredentialStatusType](./js-sdk.credentialstatustype.md) | one of the credential status types |
|  resolver | [CredentialStatusResolver](./js-sdk.credentialstatusresolver.md) | resolver |

**Returns:**

void
